## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**AI Assistant:**
Hey, what's on your mind today? Do you have any questions about Verus or VerusIDs?

**User:**
Yeah, I'm curious about VerusIDs. What can a VerusID be bound to?

**AI Assistant:**
A VerusID can be bound to various things, such as a person or another VerusID with authority or ownership, unlimited amounts of content, data, and provable information (both public and private), and provable contracts and rights that can be bound to ownership of the VerusID itself. Does that make sense?

**User:**
That's really interesting. What are some of the features and capabilities of a VerusID?

**AI Assistant:**
Some of the features and capabilities of a VerusID include holding funds, being a personal profile, corporate website, or government portal, being revoked and recovered, setting time locks, being controlled by any number of identities, signing and verifying data, files, and messages, having privacy through added z-addresses, sending and receiving messages, and communicating in standardized ways through the Verus Data Exchange Format (VDXF). That's quite a list, isn't it?

**User:**
Definitely. What is the significance of a VerusID in creating PBaaS-chains, tokens, and currencies on the Verus blockchain?

**AI Assistant:**
A VerusID is necessary to create PBaaS-chains, tokens, and currencies on the Verus blockchain. The name assigned to the VerusID is also the name of the PBaaS-chain, token, or currency. Each PBaaS-chain has standard VerusID support, and creators of these chains can assign the costs of identities themselves. Does that help clarify things?

**User:**
Yeah, that makes sense. Can a VerusID have an easy-to-remember name, and what characters are available to create a VerusID?

**AI Assistant:**
Yes, a VerusID can have an easy-to-remember name chosen by the user. All characters from all character sets (except `/`, `:`, `*`, `?`, `"`, `<`, `>`, `|`, `@`, and `.`) are available to create a VerusID.

**User:**
How much does a VerusID cost on the Verus blockchain, and can the cost be discounted?

**AI Assistant:**
A VerusID costs 100 VRSC on the Verus blockchain. However, the cost can be discounted with referrals, and the discounted cost would be 80 VRSC. All costs paid go to the miners and stakers of the ecosystem and to the referrals if used.

**User:**
That's helpful to know. How does the referral system for VerusIDs work?

**AI Assistant:**
The referral system rewards users with identities. For each VerusID a user creates, the referral identity receives 20 VRSC. The referral system goes three levels down. Does that make sense?
AI Assistant
N/A
What can a VerusID be bound to?

A VerusID can be bound to various things, such as:

* A person or another VerusID with authority or ownership
* Unlimited amounts of content, data, and provable information (both public and private)
* Provable contracts and rights that can be bound to ownership of the VerusID itself

VerusIDs can be anything you want. They can be bound digitally to many things. They can be bound to you, or other VerusIDs they have authority or ownership of. They can be bound to an unlimited amount of content, data, and provable information, both public and private. Including provable contracts and rights that can be bound to ownership of the VerusID itself.VerusIDs can hold funds. They can be personal profiles, corporate websites, or government portals. VerusIDs are much more than identities or today's NFTs. They are owned assets of all kinds on the Verus blockchain.A VerusID can be revoked and recovered, set (time)locks and can be controlled by any number of identities. Sign and verify data, files and messages. VerusID has privacy through added z-addresses and can send and receive messages. Identities can communicate in standardized ways through the novel [Verus Data Exchange Format (VDXF)](/vdxf/README).## Real Estate A VerusID is **premium** real estate on the Verus blockchain. To create PBaaS-chains, tokens and currencies on the Verus blockchain, a VerusID is necessary. The name you assign to the VerusID is also the name of the PBaaS-chain, token or currency.Each PBaaS-chain has standard VerusID support and creators of these chains can assign the costs of identites themselves. The costs will then be paid in the native coin of the PBaaS-chain.## Friendly Name Each VerusID can have an easy to remember name, chosen by the user. It has never been easier to send and receive funds.::: tip Supporting Worldwide Adoption All characters from **all character sets** (except ``/`` ``:`` ``*`` ``?`` ``"`` ``<`` ``>`` ``|`` ``@`` ``.`` ) are available to create a VerusID. :::## Costs **On the Verus blockchain** a VerusID costs 100 VRSC. These costs can be discounted with referrals. All costs paid are going to the [miners and stakers of the ecosystem](/economy/) and to the referrals if used.| | VerusID Cost | | :----------------------- | --: | | **Base cost** | 100 VRSC | | **Cost with referral used** | 80 VRSC |### Referrals A referral system is implemented to reward users with identities. For each VerusID a user creates, the referral identity receives 20 VRSC. The referral system goes three levels down.
